entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
